content: bynx hat a pattern by hayley geary @lochknits yarn ​ 175 220 yards of any dk weight yarn - sample knit with knitting niqabi non-superwash merino dk in pumpkin spice needles ​ ribbing - us 6 4 0 mm 16 circular needle ​ body - us 7 4 5 mm 16 circular needle ​ decreases - us 7 4 5 mm dpns ​ optional notions ​ cable needle optional darning needle optional sizes ​ child adult gauge ​ 21 sts & 25 row over 4 in stockinette blocked in the round on us 7 4 5 mm 24 sts & 28 row over 4 in main pattern blocked in the round on us 7 4 5 mm cable techniques c6b slip 3 sts onto cable needle & hold in back knit 3 sts from left needle knit 3 sts from cable ​ needle c6f slip 3 sts onto cable needle & hold in front knit 3 sts from left needle knit 3 sts from cable ​ needle c2b slip 1 st onto cable needle & hold in back knit 1 st from left needle knit 1 st from cable ​ needle c2f slip 1 st onto cable needle & hold in front knit 1 st from left needle knit 1 st from cable ​ needle instructions ​ ​ note instructions written between * s are to be repeated ​ ​ with your smaller circular needle co 96 120 sts using the long-tail cast on join in the round and pm for bor *k1 p1* for 1 25 2 if you want the final piece to have additional slouch work additional row of ribbing here change to larger needles next round *p3 k6 p1 k6 p3 k2 p1 k2* begin working main pattern using main chart or main written pattern work rounds 1-6 a total of six eight times proceed to crown decreases work rounds 1-8 one time switching to dpns as stitches become tight on your circular move to finishing section written
